text: The updated IA and video are now in the demo
np! that was fun. also, I'm wondering if we should put the adidas logo in as the "launcher" icon? (right now it shows a default Android icon)
that would be awesome. What dimensions do you need for that?

<@U02F8TTPU> was there any issues in the color of the video file when displayed on Glass? We had some problems when we were doing this with Israel and want to be sure the video is displaying correctly.
haha yes, when I first imported it, the colors were hilariously wrong (blue was yellow)
turns out it is a known bug with the Glass VideoView, which can be solved by setting the background color of the videoview, so now the colors should display correctly
Aaaah, yeah that's exactly what it was doing before. And yes it looked funky. Thanks for being on top of that.
